p: A total of 15 imported cases of Mayaro have been reported in the academic literature ( 9, 28, 39- 45). These cases impacted individuals from Canada, France, Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland, and unidentified parts of North America. The patients had acquired MAYV during travel in Bolivia, Brazil, Ecuador, French Guiana, Peru, and Suriname ( 9, 28, 39- 45).
